Author: attick, daemitus, alymphocyte, grammernatzi
Name: XIV Combo Expandedest
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. Plus extras.
Description:
This is an enhanced version of XIVCombo with a variety of new added features.
This is mutually exclusive with other XIVCombo versions, so make sure they do not conflict!
Changelog:
1.5.0.16:
    * GNB Burst Strike/Fated Circle to Lion Heart combo (Reign of Beasts) separated from the Bloodfest feature.
    
    1.5.0.11:
    * Blizzard 1/3 Feature now works properly.
    * High Fire 2 to Flare feature rewritten now that Enhanced Flare is gone and (High) Fire 2 is no longer used after switching to Astral Fire if you have Flare.
    * Lance Charge to Dragon Sight removed because Dragon Sight no longer exists.
    
    1.5.0.8:
    * Flare to Despair now works via reverse-AoE action detection, like Xenoglossy to Foul.
    * High Thunder to High Thunder 2 added.
    * Disclaimer added to (Between the) Ley Lines.
    * Despair to Transpose removed.
    
    1.5.0.3:
    * Initial Viper features added. More will be added later when there is further access to Job Gauge variables via Client Structs.
    
    1.5.0.1:
    * Initial Pictomancer features added.
    
    1.5.0.0:
    * Wayyy too much. Please check the commits on the github, I left changelogs for each job there.
